summary: Patches Redguard shields for Dual Sheath Redux use.
descriptionHtml:
[b]- Description -[/b]

Makes the necessary changes to the shield and weapon meshes for use with [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/34155]Dual Sheath Redux[/url].
[b]
- Requirements -[/b]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60788]Redguard shields (Hammerfell armory)[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/34155]Dual Sheath Redux[/url]

[b]- Installation -[/b]

Unpack the contents of the .zip file to your Skyrim\Data directory. Overwrite if prompted.

[b]- Uninstallation -[/b]

Delete the following files from your Skyrim\Data directory.
1) meshes\armor\farinelli\shield_1OnBack.nif
2) meshes\armor\farinelli\shield_1OnBackClk.nif
3) meshes\armor\farinelli\shield_1_eOnBack.nif
4) meshes\armor\farinelli\shield_1_eOnBackClk.nif
5) meshes\armor\farinelli\shield_2OnBack.nif
6) meshes\armor\farinelli\shield_2OnBackClk.nif
7) meshes\armor\farinelli\shield_3OnBack.nif
8) meshes\armor\farinelli\shield_3OnBackClk.nif
9) meshes\armor\farinelli\shield_4OnBack.nif
10) meshes\armor\farinelli\shield_4OnBackClk.nif
11) meshes\armor\farinelli\shield_5OnBack.nif
12) meshes\armor\farinelli\shield_5OnBackClk.nif

[b]- Changelog -[/b]

1.2 - Added the directories to ease the installation.
1.1 - Added missing Clk files - now the shields should show up on top of cloaks!
1.0 - Initial release.

[b]- Credits -[/b]

Thanks toÂ [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/1346841]farinelli[/url] and [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/1267569]Neovalen[/url] for their great mods!

[b]- Permissions -
[/b]
Any changes done to this file requires permission from [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/1346841]farinelli[/url] in accordance to permissions listed under [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60788]Redguard shields (Hammerfell armory)[/url].
author: DigitalVixen
